subject: Compatibility
description_text:
Hi, just a quick question. Do you know if the simsonn pedals work on the
drive hub device? I'm looking st getting them to work on my ps4 however
drive hub themselves weren't sure and asked me to contact you. Thank you so
much and have a great rest of your day.

Regards, Joshua.

conversations.body_text: 你好，Joshua Jurgeit，  我们尚未联系 DRIVE Hub 以实现与 SIMSONN 踏板的兼容，因此它们可能不完全兼容。
